department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography:
Douglas Lee Miller (MS Digital Cinema) is currently a New Media Manager for DePaul University.

His teaching experience includes the development of courses in Interactive and Social Media, Web Development, Content Management Systems, Digital Media Design, Digital Publishing, Communication and Media Literacy.

He also consults privately with other people and organizations regarding digital media strategy and tactical deployment. 

His formal training comes from media studies, digital storytelling and film production and he has been working in media, marketing, and technology for over 20 years.
